body.p: Some informations are get from agent dynamicaly and can't be modified :

ul.li: device_id : it's the ID of the agent generated it is running first time.
Token : it's the key used to wake agent remotely. It is regenerated each time agent begin to run.
Version : it's the versions of agent (version core and for each modules). This version is only get when agent send its inventory to plugin.
Last contact : it's the last time agent have contacted plugin.
Name : it's the name of agent. By default, name is device_id.
Disable : if it's set to YES, when agent contact plugin to get list of actions, server don't send actions. With this, agent is temporary disabled.
Computer link: It's the link with a GLPI computer. The goal is to have IP of computer to wake up theagent.
